Class BasicForm

java.lang.Object
raja.shape.BasicForm
All Implemented Interfaces:
Form, Shape3D
Direct Known Subclasses:
Billboard, Cone, Cylinder, MBox, MCone, MCylinder, MPlane, MSphere, MTorus, MTriangle, Plane, Sphere, XRectangle

    • solve2ndOrder

      protected Point3D solve2ndOrder(double a, double b, double c, Ray r)
      Returns the point on the ray corresponding to the smallest positive solution to the equation a*X^2 + b*X + c = 0.
      Parameters:
      a - , b, c the coefficients of the equation.
      r - the ray.
      Returns:
      the point r.origin + t*r.direction where t is the smallest X > 0 such that a*X^2 + b*X + c = 0 if there is any; null otherwise.

    • hasLG

      protected boolean hasLG(Point3D p)
